seo.title: Minutes.AI Pricing — simple plans for every meeting style
seo.description: No-expiry time packs and truly unlimited subscriptions. See how Minutes.AI compares to Otter and Notta on price, quotas, and rollover.
seo.ogDescription: Time packs with no expiry + unlimited subscriptions. Quick compare vs. Otter & Notta.

ld.headline: Minutes.AI Pricing
ld.description: Four straightforward plans: two one-time time packs (no expiry) and two unlimited subscriptions — plus a comparison with Otter and Notta.

hero.tagline: Choose no-expiry time packs, or go fully unlimited with monthly/annual subscriptions.

intro.p1: We offer four options tailored to how often you meet.

plans.timepacks_note: Purchased minutes never expire. Generate AI minutes from recordings any time.
plans.subs_note: Subscriptions are truly unlimited — no monthly caps.

free.text: Even without paying, you get a 3-minute free ticket every day to try Minutes.AI.

bullets: No-expiry time packs: buy once, use anytime

compare.h2: Minutes.AI vs. Otter vs. Notta — Pricing at a Glance
compare.note: Key pricing and quotas (USD). Competitors typically reset monthly quotas with no rollover.

rows.limits: Time packs never expire. Subscriptions are uncapped.

rows.unlimited: No — Pro 1200 min/mo; Business 6000 import min/mo

rows.limits: No carryover; up to 5h/recording; file upload quotas

compare.foot: Sources: official pricing pages for Otter and Notta.

why.h2: Why we designed plans this way
items: Meet daily: choose Unlimited for predictability.
Meet occasionally: buy a Light pack once — no expiry.
Just trying it: Trial pack + daily 3-minute ticket.
